elements.name: panel1
elements.title: What hurdles must be overcome if the people are to vote on ...

elements.name: Frage 1
elements.title: ... wants to bring about a constitutional article?
choices: 50,000 signatures of persons entitled to vote must be collected within 100 days.
100,000 signatures of persons entitled to vote must be collected within 18 months.
Referendum: majority of the people and the cantons (double majority)
correctAnswer: 100,000 signatures of persons entitled to vote must be collected within 18 months.
Referendum: majority of the people and the cantons (double majority)

elements.name: Frage 2
elements.title: ... wants to bring about a law?
choices: 50,000 signatures of persons entitled to vote must be collected within 100 days.
100,000 signatures of persons entitled to vote must be collected within 18 months.
Referendum: majority of the people and the cantons (double majority)
correctAnswer: 50,000 signatures of persons entitled to vote must be collected within 100 days.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: ... so that a regulation can be amended or created?
choices: 50,000 signatures of persons entitled to vote must be collected within 100 days.
100,000 signatures of persons entitled to vote must be collected within 18 months.
Referendum: majority of the people and the cantons (double majority)
